alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Statement issued February 21 at 10:55AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT THROUGH 2 PM... WHAT...Minor flooding resulting from heavy rainfall WHERE...Manu`a WHEN...Through 2 PM IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall and runoff may cause elevated stream and drainage ditch levels. Ponding may occur on roads and low lying areas. Please take extra caution due to hazardous driving conditions. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Latest satellite imagery show showers moving across the Manu`a islands that may lead to ponding of roads and low lying areas, especially as grounds are saturated. FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 1050 TAEAO ASO GAFUA FEPUARI 21 2022 ...UA IAI LE FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE 2 i le Aoauli... MAFUAAGA...O lologa ma tafega e mafua mai timuga mamafa NOFOAGA...Manu`a TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le 2 i le Aoauli AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa ma tafega e faatupulaia ai le siisii vave o auvai. E ono tutupu ai lologa i luga o aualatele ma nofoaga aafia gofie. Faamolemole faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O loo vaaia i luga o satelite timuga mamafa o loo i luga o Manu`a e ono mafua ai tafega ma lologa. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Faamolemole, ia faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. Aua ne`i savalia pe uia auvai ma aualatele o loo malosi ai tafega. E ono faatupula`ia sologa mai i mauga ona o le susu o le eleelee ua iai nei. Fa`amolemole, ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: The public is advised to take necessary precautions when driving due to hazardous driving road conditions and flooded roadways. Do not cross fast flowing water in streams and on roads. Mud and landslides are also possible along steep and mountainous areas as grounds become saturated.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
